answers.answer: If you dont mind me asking how has your bp been?? My doctor has been monitoring me as well due to high bp. At my last apt they took urine again to check protein levels and tomorrow is my apt so ill see whay they say then. Theyve been very relaxed about it though and that scares me because I feel like the seriousness of the situation could change at any time.

Mine have been high 140s/100s. If your dr thinks your bp is high they will say something and the same for the protein in your urine. Trust them they know what they are doing just dont stress that won't help at all

My bp readings are usually 140s/80-90s. Ive also already tested positive for protein in the urine back around 22 weeks or so. They said it was plus 1 but didnt really elaborate. They took another sample at 31 weeks to see if its changed at all. Im not really stressed about it though just curious.
That's why we pee in a cup every visit to check protein in urine right? Or how do I know if im ok
They test for a lot of stuff when you pee in the cup including protein it is and infections

Im not sure. My office is small so in order to check for things like protein they have to send it out to a lab. I still give a sample at every apt though they do dip some sort of a test strip that tests for a few things but Im not 100% what it tests for.

TeresaFlores my SIL's sister was diagnosed with preeclampsia two weeks ago. She as well received a shot to help the baby grow and develop. Two days ago (3 weeks early) she had a beautiful little girl. Happy and healthy!! Just stay calm and try not to worry.
Thank you everyone for the support

question: So I been having high blood pressure for a few wks and this wk at my 34wk appt I had protein in my urine and high BP so my dr sent me to labor and delivery to be screened and tests down and they came back I have preeclampsia. They gave me shots to help him develop and grow faster and I did have a mini meltdown because I am scared and this is all new to me. But from what I was told I will be having a may baby instead of a june one, all i care about is him being healthy and safe.
title: I have preeclampsia!
